item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, December 11, 2024 at 7:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. FCC Opens Entire 6 GHz Band to Low Power Device Operations (91 points | 20 comments)
2. PeerTube mobile app: discover videos while caring for your attention (197 points | 83 comments)
3. Launch HN: Azalea Robotics (YC S24) – Baggage-handling robots for airports (32 points | 6 comments)
4. RISC-V HiFive Premier P550 Development Boards with Ubuntu Now Available (71 points | 29 comments)
5. X41 Reviewed Mullvad VPN (32 points | 2 comments)
6. Gemini 2.0: our new AI model for the agentic era (399 points | 196 comments)
7. Pgroll – Zero-downtime, reversible, schema changes for PostgreSQL (new website) (68 points | 10 comments)
8. Django and Postgres for the Busy Rails Developer (63 points | 17 comments)
9. Dioxus 0.6 – Crossplatform apps with Rust (114 points | 54 comments)
10. Charge Robotics (YC S21) is hiring MechEs to build robots that build solar farms ( | hide)
11. Making memcpy(NULL, NULL, 0) well-defined (162 points | 137 comments)
12. Trillium TPU Is GA (38 points | 11 comments)
13. Bankruptcy judge rejects sale of Infowars to The Onion (415 points | 625 comments)

15. The GPU is not always faster (51 points | 36 comments)
16. FCC Could Block over 2,400 Providers from Robocall Mitigation Database (6 points | discuss)
17. Bi-elliptic transfer orbit maneuver (39 points | 21 comments)
18. Being overweight overtakes tobacco smoking as the leading disease risk factor (137 points | 127 comments)
19. Estimated concentrations of atrazine in agricultural groundwater (120 points | 55 comments)
20. OpenLoco/OpenLoco: An open source re-implementation of Chris Sawyer's Locomotion (22 points | 6 comments)
21. Show HN: KeyTik: The All-in-One Automation Tool (17 points | 4 comments)
22. Phantom Vibrations of a Lost Smartphone (31 points | 11 comments)
23. Understanding the Odin Programming Language (103 points | 42 comments)
24. The case against Google's claims of "quantum supremacy" (127 points | 87 comments)
25. Don't Get Distracted (2017) (178 points | 115 comments)
26. How WhatsApp for business changed the world (28 points | 54 comments)
27. Machine Learning-Driven Static Profiling for GraalVM Native Image (26 points | 3 comments)
28. Matt Mullenweg keeps digging his own grave (59 points | 24 comments)
29. Chatbot 'encouraged teen to kill parents over screen time limit' (17 points | discuss)
30. We all took the DVD boom era for granted (140 points | 240 comments)
